Raid Day.title: Mega Camerupt Raid Day
Raid Day.description: Mega Camerupt charges in for its Pokémon GO debut!
bonuses: 2× Stardust from Raid Battles
50% more XP from Raid Battles
Increased chance of encountering Shiny Camerupt from Mega Raids
Increased chance to get Rare Candy XL from Raid Battles
Receive up to eight additional free Raid Passes from spinning Gym Photo Discs (for a total of 14)
Receive up to five additional free Raid Passes from spinning Gym Photo Discs (for a total of six)
Remote Raid Pass limit increased to 20 from Saturday, September 27, at 5:00 p.m. to Sunday, September 28, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. PDT

Raid Day.title: Mega Metagross Raid Day
Raid Day.description: Link up for a battle of the minds on Mega Metagross Raid Day!
bonuses: 2× Stardust from Raid Battles
5,000 XP from Raid Battles
Increased chance of encountering Shiny Metagross from Mega Raids
Increased chance to get Rare Candy XL from Raid Battles
Receive up to eight additional free Raid Passes from spinning Gym Photo Discs (for a total of 14)
Receive up to five additional free Raid Passes from spinning Gym Photo Discs (for a total of six)
Remote Raid Pass limit increased to 20 from Friday, October 3, at 5:00 p.m. to Saturday, October 4, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. PDT

Event.title: Psychic Spectacular: Taken Over
Event.description: The Psychic Spectacular: Taken Over event arrives, featuring Indeedee’s debut! Face Team GO Rocket, save Shadow Incarnate Forme Tornadus, and enjoy special bonuses throughout the event!
bonuses: 1/2 Egg Hatch Distance when Eggs are placed in an Incubator during the event period
Additional Candy for Nice Throws or better
Increased chance for Candy XL for Nice Throws or better for Trainers level 31 and up
Lunatone and Solrock will both appear in the wild during the event, regardless of your location
Pokémon caught via one-star and three-star Shadow Raids during the event will have a wider variance of Attack, Defense, and HP*
Team GO Rocket will appear more frequently at PokéStops and in balloons* **
You can use a Charged TM to help a Shadow Pokémon forget the Charged Attack Frustration*

Event.title: Completely Normal
Event.description: The Land Snake Pokémon Dudunsparce will make its Pokémon GO debut! Enjoy event bonuses, wild encounters, and more during this completely normal event.
bonuses: 2× Candy for catching Pokémon
2× XP for evolving Pokémon
Increased chance to encounter Ditto
Increased chance to encounter Shiny Dunsparce

PokéStop Showcase.title: Farfetch'd, Mr. Mime, Kangaskhan, and Tauros PokéStop Showcases
Venusaur, Charizard, and Blastoise PokéStop Showcases
Psyduck, Arcanine, Shinx, and Sealeo PokéStop Showcases
PokéStop Showcase.description: There will be PokéStop Showcases featuring Psyduck, Arcanine, Hisuian Arcanine, Shinx, and Sealeo. Top the leaderboard to win rewards including Premium Items!

PokéStop Showcase.title: Indeedee PokéStop Showcases
PokéStop Showcase.description: There will be PokéStop Showcases featuring Indeedee (Male) and Indeedee (Female). Top the leaderboard to win rewards including Premium Items!

PokéStop Showcase.title: Ditto, Dunsparce, Dudunsparce PokéStop Showcases
PokéStop Showcase.description: There will be PokéStop Showcases featuring Ditto, Dunsparce, and Dudunsparce. Top the leaderboard to win rewards including Premium Items!

PokéStop Showcase.title: Camerupt and Dudunsparce PokéStop Showcases
PokéStop Showcase.description: There will be PokéStop Showcases featuring Camerupt and Dudunsparce. Top the leaderboard to win rewards including Premium Items!

PokéStop Showcase.title: Steel-type PokéStop Showcases
PokéStop Showcase.description: There will be PokéStop Showcases featuring Steel-type Pokémon. Top the leaderboard to win rewards including Premium Items!

Max Mondays.title: Dynamax Chansey during Max Monday
Max Mondays.description:
These Dynamax Pokémon may appear in Max Battles throughout Delightful Days. They will also take over Power Spots for an hour each week on Mondays from 6:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. local time!
OnSeptember 22, 2025, the featured Dynamax Pokémon isChansey.

Raid Battles.title: Mega Kanto Starters in Mega Raids
Mega Pidgeot and Mega Gyarados in Mega Raids
Mega Gardevoir, Latias, Latios, and Gallade in Mega Raids
Raid Battles.description: Mega Gardevoir, Mega Latias, Mega Latios, and Mega Gallade return to Mega Raids on September 16, 2025, at 10 am local time.

Raid Battles.title: Mega Kangaskhan and Mega Lopunny in Mega Raids
Raid Battles.description: Mega Kangaskhan and Mega Lopunny return to Mega Raids on September 23, 2025, at 10 am local time.

GO Battle League.title: Great League and Retro Cup: Great League Edition | Tales of Transformation
Ultra League and Summer Cup: Great League Edition | Tales of Transformation
Master League: Mega Edition and Willpower Cup: Great League Edition | Tales of Transformation
GO Battle League.description:
The Master League: Mega Edition and Willpower Cup: Great League Edition will run from September 16, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. to September 23, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
Trainers will also receive 4× Stardust from win rewards (this does not include end-of-set rewards).
The following Pokémon will not be allowed.

GO Battle League.title: Great League, Ultra League, and Master League | Tales of Transformation
GO Battle League.description:
The Great League, Ultra League, and Master League will run from September 23, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. to September 30, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. PT.
Trainers will also receive 4× Stardust from win rewards (this does not include end-of-set rewards).

Pokémon Spotlight Hour.title: Hoothoot Spotlight Hour
Pokémon Spotlight Hour.description:
Pokémon Spotlight Hour will feature a different Pokémon and special bonus for one hour at 6:00 p.m. local time on Tuesday during the month of September.
September 23: The featured Pokémon isHoothootand the special bonus is2× Catch Candy.

Pokémon Spotlight Hour.title: Aron Spotlight Hour
Pokémon Spotlight Hour.description:
Pokémon Spotlight Hour will feature a different Pokémon and special bonus for one hour at 6:00 p.m. local time on Tuesday during the month of September.
September 30: The featured Pokémon isAronand the special bonus is2× Transfer Candy.

Raid Hour.title: Mega Latias and Mega Latios Raid Hour
Raid Hour.description: A Raid Hour featuring Mega Latias and Mega Latios is scheduled from 6 to 7 pm Local Time. During this hour there will be an increased number of Mega Raids.

Raid Hour.title: Dialga (Origin Forme) Raid Hour
Raid Hour.description:
A Raid Hour featuring Dialga (Origin Forme) is scheduled from 6 to 7 pm Local Time. During this hour there will be an increased number of 5-star Raids.
Origin Forme Dialga caught during Raid Hour may know the Charged Attack Roar of Time.

Raid Hour.title: Dialga (Origin Forme) Raid Hour
Raid Hour.description:
A Raid Hour featuring Dialga (Origin Forme) is scheduled from 6 to 7 pm Local Time. During this hour there will be an increased number of 5-star Raids.
Origin Forme Dialga caught during Raid Hour may know the Charged Attack Roar of Time.

Raid Weekend.title: Shadow Groudon Raid Weekend
Raid Weekend.description: Band together and save Shadow Groudon from Team GO Rocket during a Shadow Raid Weekend event!
bonuses: 2× Stardust from Raid Battles
50% more XP from Raid Battles
Five additional Raid Passes per day from spinning Photo Discs at Gyms (for a daily total of seven)
One additional Raid Pass per day from spinning Photo Discs at Gyms (for a daily total of two)

City Safari.title: Bangkok, Thailand - Pokémon GO City Safari
City Safari.description:
Pokémon GO City Safari is coming to Bangkok, Thailand, on September 27 and 28, 2025! Set off on a citywide adventure as you discover the vibrant stories, new friends, and exciting Pokémon waiting for you in Bangkok!
Whether you’re a resident of Bangkok or a first-time visitor, your Pokémon GO City Safari will take you across the city in an all-new way—from historic landmarks to local favorites, get ready for a taste of the city with Pokémon GO by your side!
One-day Tickets are ฿285 (including any applicable taxes and fees) on either September 27, 2025 or September 28, 2025, from 10 am to 6 pm ICT.
bonuses: 1 additional Candy XL awarded for catching Pokémon in five-star raids and Mega Raids (Trainers level 31+)
1/2 Egg Hatch Distance
1/2 Stardust Cost for trades within the city
2× Hatch Candy
2× Hatch Stardust
2× Hatch XP
3 additional Candy awarded for catching Pokémon in five-star raids and Mega Raids
Additional 5,000 XP from completed raids
An increased chance of encountering Shiny Pokémon
Lure Modules (excluding Golden Lures) activated during the event will last for four hours
Lure Modules activated during the event will last for four hours
Trades will require 50% less Stardust
Up to 12 free Raid Passes per day by spinning Photo Discs at Gyms
Up to five Special Trades can be made during the day on your ticket while in Bangkok!
Up to five Special Trades daily within the city
Your buddy may find the City Safari–exclusive Tiny Compass souvenir
